EmailTemplate.subject: Realizing more value through whole-person health
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The evolution of care is here As virtual care evolves and gains wider acceptance, health plans are experiencing the many benefits of expanding access to care though whole-person care solutions, including virtual primary care. There are opportunities and outcomes that health plans can realize when moving to a virtual whole-person care model. Learn how: • Health plans are looking to move from point solutions to more comprehensive offerings • Virtual care can help advance health equity through better access and shorter wait times • Virtual primary care improves health outcomes through earlier diagnoses of chronic conditions About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
